query:
-- 查看现有分类
SELECT * FROM categories;

-- 插入"生肖守护"分类
INSERT INTO categories (id, name, slug, description, image, parentId, displayOrder, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  6,
  '生肖守护',
  'zodiac-guardian',
  '十二生肖守护吊坠，五台山古法开光加持，守护您的本命运势',
  NULL,
  NULL,
  2,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- 插入"星座守护"分类

  'constellation-guardian',
  '十二星座守护吊坠，融合东方能量仪式与西方星座智慧',
  NULL,
  NULL,
  3,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);
